message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.MM 

This paper deals with motion estimation, which is a common problem in computer vision. The use of piecewise affine motion fields is also a well-established technique in this field. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a new optimization scheme, which involves proximal splitting, and this is a common technique in machine learning and optimization, which suggests that cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely category. The paper also involves the use of regularization, which is a common technique in optimization and machine learning, which suggests that cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a likely category. The paper also involves the use of efficient algorithms, which suggests that cs.GR (Graphics) is also a likely category. Finally, the paper involves the use of evaluation benchmarks, which suggests that cs.MM (Multimedia) is also a likely category.
